objectives.hint: Embolden the descendant of two famous Sunspears on a dangerous patrol.
objectives.name: Ashhe, the Rune of Valor

objectives.hint: Purchase this relic from Dunkoro's ghost in the Lair of the Forgotten. 25 Gold.
objectives.name: Ancient Sunspear Flags

objectives.hint: Purchase this relic from Kisha Odili in the Desolation. 25 Gold.
objectives.name: Prayer Lights

objectives.hint: Acquire this relic from the last spearmarshal.
objectives.name: Spearmarshal's Plea

objectives.hint: Collect this egg from the griffon roost.
objectives.name: Warmed Canyon Griffon Egg

objectives.hint: Collect this egg from atop the links of a broken chain.
objectives.name: Dark Canyon Griffon Egg

objectives.hint: Collect this egg from a atop a spire near Chukeht Overlook.
objectives.name: Pale Canyon Griffon Egg

objectives.hint: Collect this egg from a bluff overlooking the Ruination.
objectives.name: Mottled Canyon Griffon Egg
